name: Chronicle of Innsmouth
description: Chronicle of Innsmouth was born by combining the stories of master-of-horror, H.P. Lovecraft, and the style of Lucas’ graphic adventures in the 90s. Horror scenes and creepy moments create the many grotesque and paradoxical situations.
minimum_requirements: Mínimo: SO: Windows XP or higher Procesador: Intel or AMD CPU Memoria: 512 MB de RAM Gráficos: 320x200, 32 bit colour DirectX: Versión 9.0c Almacenamiento: 1 GB de espacio disponible Tarjeta de sonido: All DirectX-compatible sound cards
recommended_requirements: Recomendado: SO: Windows 8 or higher Procesador: Intel or AMD cpu Memoria: 1 GB de RAM Gráficos: 320x200, 32 bit colour DirectX: Versión 9.0c Almacenamiento: 1 GB de espacio disponible Tarjeta de sonido: All DirectX-compatible sound cards
